doc.title: Qissa-E-Ulfat
doc.plot: Ophelia has a background in journalism but wants to pursue her dream by writing love stories. The impetus for this change is Faisal Rehman (playing himself for the first time ever). Qissa-e -Ulfat is not just a story of their romance but the sub-stories that their relationship breeds. Written by Khurram Ali Shafiq and directed by S. Ali Raza (Usama) Qissa-e-Ulfat dares to ventures into new formats and characterizations, in an attempt to understand and explore love in the contemporary world.
